Delete Meal Are you sure you want to delete this meal? It's no longer available after this action. Add Ingredient(s) Yes No search…s About
©Pascal Kühnold
This app is developed by Pascal Kühnold.

Icons made by Pixel perfect from www.flaticon.com


Chefkoch.de
&version;
Hey, thanks a lot for testing my App!
 
The App is still in development and it could be possible that you may run into problems.
 
If so, I would appreciate it if you could tell me where this problem occurred.
 
Should you come across serious errors, such as the app crashing, please send me a message as well.
 
Also it would be best if you can add where it happened and what you were exactly doing.
 
Since the app is still under development, it is possible that larger parts of the backend side will change.
 
Which may mean that the App needs to be reinstalled.
 
All previously entered data will be deleted.
 
Please be aware of this.

 
If you have any suggestions or ideas to improve the App, please feel free to contact me.

 
The app is currently using Chefkoch.de as a way to add meals.
That means that you need to have an Internet-connection(WLAN recommended because of data use) and should be aware that you are directed to an external link.

 
Have fun testing!
 
Pascal
Alright Welcome to the mealplanner Don't show again Weekly planner veggie einkaufsliste_background_texture Is checked in list Open Positions: %1$d Meal for multiple days Fast preparation Meal name: Ingredients: Information Show Receipt You don't have enough Veggie meals. You need at least 7 Veggie meals to create a Weekly Veggie planner Find Recipe Show meal No Input "Item %1$s " By continuing you will be forwarded to Chefkoch.de!
An Internetconnection is necessary.
WLAN is recommended.

 Here you can enter a headword and you can search for a recipe with that word by continuing.
